name: oncardval
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(cfv(ccrd, c0), cint(crab(s0, con0, wbr(cv(s0), cen, c0)))))

comment: The value of the cardinal number function with an ordinal number as its argument. Unlike ~ cardval , this theorem does not require the Axiom of Choice. (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2013.)
